column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Love this place. It has a fun communal vibe
column2: but can get loud at times with the music + people. The first time I came here
column3: I got the brussel sprouts and vegetable ramen soup. Brussel sprouts were a hit
column4: but the vegetable ramen was pretty bland and not memorable. Came here after several years
column5: and was excited to try their spicy creamy vegetable ramen. It...is...so....good. I've come back several times after Â just to eat this and I definitely can finish the whole thing without any problems.
